value.title: This Robot Trader Just Turned Bullish on Amazon, Facebook, and Nvidia. Here’s What It Sold.

value.title: iRobot's Roomba j7+ Robot Vacuum Uses Machine Learning to Avoid Pet Poop
value.excerpt: The company is offering a P.O.O.P. (Pet Owner Official Promise) guarantee that its latest robot vac will avoid solid waste.

value.title: Wells Fargo applies machine learning, robotics to accounts receivable

value.title: Global Investment Bank & Capital Trust Announce $68 Million Investment in AI

value.title: A Chinese EV startup wants to build a ridable robot unicorn for kids
value.excerpt: Never mind buying a robot dog for your kids — you might just get them a mythical creature instead. Chinese EV maker Xpeng has teased a robot unicorn meant for children to ride.

value.title: Sonoco (SON) Inks Deal With AMP Robotics, Boosts Paper Can Recycling
value.excerpt: Sonoco Products Company SON has joined forces with AMP Robotics to recycle the spiral wound paper canister with steel bottom produced by it and other manufacturers. Recycled steel usage has a 45% lesser environmental impact when compared to producing an equal amount from a virgin material,

value.title: Could Boston Dynamics Robots Beat Me in a Fight?
value.excerpt: In a vast warehouse-style room, two humanoid robots are taking on an obstacle course. Their barrel-shaped torsos, stuffed with processors and batteries, make it look as if they’ve been going to the gym a lot but have neglected leg day.

value.title: University of Idaho Robotics Flourish at North Idaho College
value.excerpt: Since relocating to North Idaho College's Hedlund Building, the university's robotics program is teaching students to write software and preparing them for careers in fields such as manufacturing and cybersecurity.

value.title: Xilinx Showcases Powerful Adaptable Platform Solutions For Data Center, Medical, Robotics And Other Key Markets
value.excerpt: It’s obvious, beyond the complementary product line synergies, why AMD was so interested in pursuing Xilinx for acquisition. This company has done more for demystifying the FPGA (Field Programmable Gate Array) and adaptive computing than many of its competitors.

value.title: Everything AI and robotics at TechCrunch Disrupt 2021
value.excerpt: AI is everywhere in tech, and you can bet it will be a vital topic at TechCrunch Disrupt 2021 on 21-23. It’s the driving force behind just about everything from rockets, robotics and customer service to deep science and autonomous vehicles.

value.title: Singapore has safety patrol robots now! This should be fine.

value.title: Astronauts in space will soon resurrect an AI robot friend called CIMON

value.title: Laser-powered robot weeder zaps without poison

value.title: Workers fear robots and automation from Covid are here to stay. But they create jobs.

value.title: The Latest Trends in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML)
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) contains many subfields, including machine learning (ML), which automates analytical model building. It uses methods from neural networks, statistics, operations research and physics to find hidden insights in data without being explicitly programmed where to look or what to conclude.

value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla Making a Robot Because “Robots Are Coming Anyway”
value.excerpt: For years, Tesla CEO Elon Musk has warned us that artificial intelligence is coming for us all. “I’ve been banging this AI drum for a decade,” Musk told Insider last year. He’s even gone as far as saying that AI is more dangerous than nuclear war.

value.title: Meet 'EMMA': The AI robot masseuse practicing ancient wellness therapies
value.excerpt: Developed by Singapore-based startup AiTreat, "EMMA" is a robot masseuse that uses sensors and 3D vision to deliver deep tissue massages and traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) therapies.
